description:
This course covers family nutrition, both for individuals looking to achieve their weight loss goals as well as better health. The course also covers managing healthy eating for kids, including strategies for getting kids to eat healthier foods and dealing with resistant attitudes and behaviors.

The methods used are EASY to follow and tested by real families. Discover the easiest way to manage your family's health- and enjoy the experience!

The content is delivered via video. Supplemental worksheets, sample meal plans, and other printable resources are provided as well.

The course is self-paced. I recommend completing 1 section per week to allow time to practice using the concepts presented.
title: Family Nutrition To Go:Health, Weight & Getting Kids to Eat!
